name: Level 2 FMP
description:
Supported Inputs:

Keyboard

DualSense

DualShock 4

Nintendo Switch Pro Controller

Xbox Wireless Controller

--------------------------------------------

System Controls:

Space: Pause

Hold Space: Reset

--------------------------------------------

Default Controls:

A / D: Move Left / Right

S: Crouch

K: Jump

M: Swap with Target

N: Lock Onto Target
